overview:
William F. Zachmann is well known industry analyst currently specializing in Web 2.0 social networking, virtualization, VR worlds, server platforms, and software development tools. Mr. Zachmann is President and CEO of Canopus Research Inc. and also a Senior Analyst for Wainhouse Research, LLC where he directs and manages Wainhouse’s Enterprise Social Networking (ESN) practice.

Previously a Vice President at Meta Group and Senior Vice President, Corporate Research of International Data Group (IDC), Mr. Zachmann is also a writer and columnist for many publications. He is listed in Marquis’ Who’s Who in America and Who’s Who in the World.
